nodes.bodyText: The entropy quality of the lower and higher 32 bits of the XXH3 output should be pretty much the same, but mixing them together doesn't hurt either. If we didn't mix, we probably should have added an explicit uint32_t cast anyway to avoid any latent truncation warnings from the compiler.
clusterName -> cluster (as elsewhere in the file).
These could all safely be noexcept now

There may be some clever code somewhere that looks at message addresses at arbitrary points in time, so the answer is "maaaybe?" 🙂 But with these changes it seems moving cannot realistically be cheaper than a copy anyway.
